Package com.jalios.jcmsplugin.collaborativespace.guest.filter

Class GuestAccountRightPolicyFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcms.policy.AbstractPolicyFilter
      • com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
        • com.jalios.jcmsplugin.collaborativespace.guest.filter.GuestAccountRightPolicyFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jalios.jcms.plugin.PluginComponent, com.jalios.jcms.policy.PolicyFilter, com.jalios.jcms.policy.RightPolicyFilter, GuestAccountsConstants, com.jalios.util.JPropertiesListener, java.lang.Comparable
    public class GuestAccountRightPolicyFilter
extends com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
implements GuestAccountsConstants, com.jalios.util.JPropertiesListener
    This policy filter filters access for a Guest account on :
    • Publications
    • Categories
    • Groups
    It also authorizes a guest to see an image FileDocument which has been declared as topbar logo property. (CSP-587)
    Since:
    csp-4.1
    Author:
    Sylvain Devaux <sylvain.devaux@jalios.com>

    • Method Detail

      • canBeReadBy

        public boolean canBeReadBy​(boolean isAuthorized,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Publication pub,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                           boolean searchInGroups)
        Provides custom right policy behavior for guest accounts only, and if pub is an instance of observed class, but not an instance of ignored classes.
        Native Observed classes are:
        • UserContent
        • PortalInterface
        • Content

        Ignored classes may be declared by additional plugins. (See GuestAccountsConstants.GUEST_ACCOUNTS_IGNORE_PUBLICATION_TYPE_PREFIX_PROP).
        Specified by:
        canBeReadBy in interface com.jalios.jcms.policy.RightPolicyFilter
        Overrides:
        canBeReadBy in class com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
        Since:
        csp-4.1
        See Also:
        BasicRightPolicyFilter.canBeReadBy(boolean, com.jalios.jcms.Publication, com.jalios.jcms.Member, boolean)

        public boolean canBeReadBy​(boolean isAuthorized,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Member mbrToRead,

        Specified by:

      • canBeReadBy

        public boolean canBeReadBy​(com.jalios.jcms.Member otherMember,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Member guestAccount)
        A Member M can be seen by a guest account G only if :
        • M has usage Member.USAGE_ACCOUNT.
        • and M and G share at least one Workspace.
        Parameters:
        otherMember - the member to see
        guestAccount - the guest account
        Returns:
        true if guestAccount can see otherMember
        Since:
        csp-4.1

      • canBeReadBy

        public boolean canBeReadBy​(com.jalios.jcms.Category cat,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Member guestAccount)
        Returns true if the given Category is :
        • in the categories Tree of any of the member's workspaces.
        • is an ancestor of a Category in the categories Tree of any of the member's workspaces.
        • is in the channel Tags' tree.
        Parameters:
        cat - the Category
        guestAccount - the guest account
        Returns:
        true if the Category can be seen.
        Since:
        csp-4.1

      • canBeReadBy

        public boolean canBeReadBy​(boolean isAuthorized,
                           com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws,
                           com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr)
        Checks if a member can read the specified Workspace.
        Specified by:
        canBeReadBy in interface com.jalios.jcms.policy.RightPolicyFilter
        Overrides:
        canBeReadBy in class com.jalios.jcms.policy.BasicRightPolicyFilter
        Parameters:
        isAuthorized - true if internal JCMS control authorized the member to perform this action
        ws - the Workspace that would be read
        mbr - the Member performing the read operation
        Returns:
        true if the member can read the Workspace, false otherwise
        Since:
        csp-7.5.8 / CSP-824

      • checkImagePropertyAccess

        protected static boolean checkImagePropertyAccess​(java.lang.String imageProperty,
                                                  com.jalios.jcms.FileDocument fileDoc,
                                                  com.jalios.jcms.Member guestAccount)
        Will return true when accessing an image bound to given property.
        Returns false by default.
        Parameters:
        imageProperty - a JProperty key to test if its value is equivalent to given fileDoc's filename.
        fileDoc - the document being accessed
        guestAccount - the loggedMember
        Returns:
        weither guest should have access to this doc
        Since:
        csp-7.3
